question.text: Which of the following statement is true about cockroach?

options.text: There are three ganglia in thorax and nine in abdomen
Each eye consists of about 6000 hexagonal ommatidia
Fat body, nephrocytes and uricose glands help in excretion
Respiratory system consists of network of trachea that open through 8 pairs of spiracles

solution.text: Cockroaches consist of nine ganglia. Out of these three are present in the thorax and six are in the abdomen. Cockroaches consist of compound eyes and these contain small units known as ommatidia. which is around 2000 in number. Respiratory system consists of ten pairs of spiracles. Excretion is done with the help of Fat bodies, nephrocytes and uricose glands.
